review: Chromecast works amazingly well. I am able to stream data from my tablet, laptop, and other devices on my network flawlessly. I highly recommend this device. If this could turn on my tv too (probably possible; haven't investigated), I would consider it the best device in its class. I particularly like being able to stream my screen as is, rather than using pre-constructed applications.One possible qualification is network/router speed: use the channel with the highest bandwidth possible for best performance. I run it on a 5 GHz network; your mileage my vary.
author: David Martel

review: Works as advertised - easy to install, easy to navigate. I've accessed it from my laptop, desktop, tablet and phone. I wish it was more compatible with Apple products, but I completely understand why it isn't.
